project.name: Firebrick UI API
project.description: Firebrick UI API: a component library for Firebrick MVC, Knockout JS, jQuery and Bootstrap

plugins.name: plugins

Firebrick.ui.name: Firebrick.ui
Firebrick.ui.description: Firebrick component library for Firebrick JS MVC

components.button.ButtonGroup.name: components.button.ButtonGroup
components.button.ButtonGroup.description: the items property does not need to have each object defined with its sName, that is down automatically

components.fields.Display.name: components.fields.Display
components.fields.Display.description: read only input field but doesn't look like an input field

ui.name: ui
ui.description: Firebrick component library for Firebrick JS MVC

KeyEvents.name: KeyEvents
KeyEvents.description: cross platform as chrome doesn't support them natively

helper.name: helper
helper.description: similar to utils, but are component related

components.common.mixins.components.comm.name: components.common.mixins.components.common.Base
components.common.mixins.components.comm.description: Super class for all components. Extends from Firebrick.view.Base

components.common.mixins.components.butt.name: components.common.mixins.components.button.ButtonGroupBase
components.common.mixins.components.butt.description: do not extend from this but from Firebrick.ui.button.ButtonGroup

components.button.components.common.Mult.name: components.button.components.common.MultiplesBase
components.button.components.common.Mult.description: Base for inputs where multiple options are possible: checkboxes, radio and togglesbuttons for example

components.table.plugins.EditableTable.name: components.table.plugins.EditableTable

example: columns: [{ mapping: {String} dot notation to property in store json type: {String} [default=input] | number, float, checkbox, date - used to format the value or run a default renderer format: {String} - used to format the type if needed. Example for type=date - format YYYY-MM-DD editable: {Boolean} [default=true] - specify whether the cells in this column should be editable. Only valid if the table's editabletable is also set to true editConf: {Object} used to configure the Editable table plugin - see Plugin for configuration text: {String} column title ( ) renderer: {Function} define this to parse the value before it is display and output "anything" you like - for example to convert an String value into an tag. data-bind attributes on dynamic created elements work here too arguments passed are -> (columnConfig, koValue, rawValue) }]

params.description: to populate which which dependencies have already been added to deps - **variable pointers**

classitems.description:
cell editing
remove the editMarker and reset any "globals"

only for inline edit
cancels any changes made and replaces the HTML with the pre-edit state

params.name: value
params.description: optional - if set, once the cell is reset to its original state, the value will be set

classitems.description: takes a value from the edit field and parses it accordingly - for example if the value of radio options should be numbers

params.description: tr that is to be edited

classitems.description: override InputContainerBindings function to add more properties
classitems.name: cellEditInputContainerBindings

classitems.description:
create a new init function with a rendered listener for the edit field
when an edit field is rendered, add the column number as a property (_prop) to the class
classitems.name: _initFunction

classitems.description: override edit field init - cell edit only
classitems.name: _cellEditInit

classitems.description: sets the bootstrap css class "responsive" to the table
classitems.name: responsiveClass

classitems.description: activates the responsive-table-js package on the table
classitems.name: responsive

example: columns: [{ mapping: {String} dot notation to property in store json type: {String} [default=input] | number, float, checkbox, date - used to format the value or run a default renderer format: {String} - used to format the type if needed. Example for type=date - format YYYY-MM-DD editable: {Boolean} [default=true] - specify whether the cells in this column should be editable. Only valid if the table's editabletable is also set to true editConf: {Object} used to configure the Editable table plugin - see Plugin for configuration text: {String} column title ( ) renderer: {Function} define this to parse the value before it is display and output "anything" you like - for example to convert an String value into an tag. data-bind attributes on dynamic created elements work here too arguments passed are -> (columnConfig, koValue, rawValue) }]
classitems.name: columns

classitems.description: activate the editable table plugin
classitems.name: editabletable

classitems.description: which property the data of the tr is stored to the element

classitems.description:
this is the very config that is used to configure the modal that is
shown for editing a record - use the properties of
Firebrick.ui.containers.Modal
example:
{ _showEditButtons: true|false //controls whether the footer
         buttons are shown [default=true] _editOkText: "OK" //
         [default="OK"] only if _showEditButtons === true
         _editCancelText: "Cancel" // [default="Cancel"] only if
         _showEditButtons === true }
classitems.name: editModalConfig

classitems.description:
if you are unsure of the parameters type - use this function to get the raw value. I.e. if its a function it will be called and returned, otherwise it will just return it.
useful when working with Knockout objects
classitems.name: getValue
